data.title: CROATIA: The whole country will dance on Saturday to the rhythms of Rim Tim Tagi Dim!
data.meta_description: There is a frenzy going on in Croatia with Baby Lasagna and "Rim Tim Tagi Dim", just days before the Croatian delegation leaves for Malm√∂,
data.text:
There is a frenzy going on in Croatia with Baby Lasagna and ‚ÄúRim Tim Tagi Dim‚Äù, just days before the Croatian delegation leaves for Malm√∂, Sweden, where the 68th Eurovision Song Contest will be held.

Artists, intellectuals, celebrities, TV people, but also politicians share daily on their profiles in social networks, especially on TikTok, their attempts to dance with Baby Lasagna to the Croatian entry for Eurovision 2024, ‚ÄúRim Tim Tagi Dim‚Äù.

@thebabylasagnaofficial Make a duet with me so I can see how you Rim Tim Tagi Dim üòª #babylasagna #rimtimtagidimchallenge #eurovision ‚ô¨ original sound ‚Äì Cristian | Eurovision

At the same time, the Croatian broadcaster, HRT, issued yesterday an open invitation to all citizens of the country to gather in public places and dance en masse to the rhythms of ‚ÄúRim Tim Tagi Dim‚Äù on Saturday, April 13.

Thus, on Saturday, at noon, the residents of five Croatian cities (Zagreb, Split, Zadar, Osijek and Umag) will be invited to become centers of dance events. In this way, Croatia will practically declare its support for its representative, Baby Lasagna, and wish him ‚Äúgood luck‚Äù before Malm√∂.

Happy that Croatia‚Äôs name is spreading all over Europe, we would like to make Croatia dance even more, send support to our representative and show a piece of Croatian beauty to the European audience.

HRT

The dance events will be recorded by the Croatian Radio Television cameras and broadcast on HRT‚Äôs famous shows, so stay tuned to www.ogaegreece.com for more footage!

Croatia in the Eurovision Song Contest‚Ä¶

Participating broadcaster: HRT

Participations: 29 (20 finals)

Debut: 1993

Highest placement: 2nd (2024)

Lowest placement: 17th in the Semi Final (2018)
